brief.image_brief: A split image. On the left, a person (representing Alex Chen, a Performance Marketing Manager) looking puzzled at a complex, tangled web of data lines and graphs, conveying 'surface-level data' and 'guessing.' Colors are muted, hinting at frustration. On the right, the same person is now confident, smiling, and pointing to a clear, intuitive, and modern dashboard displaying actionable 'deep creative insights' and positive ROI metrics. The right side is vibrant with brand colors: blues and whites dominating, with crisp black text. A subtle glow or 'unlock' icon connects the two sides, symbolizing 'unlocking true ad performance.' The overall tone is informative and empowering.

video_brief.hook: Unlock true ad performance and insights.

scenes.visual: Opening shot: A close-up on a person (representing Alex Chen, Performance Marketing Manager) looking stressed or overwhelmed by a screen filled with complex, cluttered ad performance data charts and spreadsheets. The screen displays confusing metrics, suggesting 'surface-level data' and 'guessing.' Colors are dull.

Transition: The chaotic data on the screen smoothly transforms into a clean, modern, and intuitive dashboard. Animated graphs show clear, actionable 'deep creative insights' and positive ROI trends. Brand colors (blue, white, black) are prominent, creating a sense of clarity and organization. A subtle 'unlock' animation appears.

The person from the first scene is now confident and engaged, easily interacting with the insights dashboard. They make a quick, decisive action (e.g., clicking an 'iterate' button). Visuals show a rapid increase in ROI and campaign performance metrics, emphasizing 'instantly iterate for maximum campaign ROI'.

Final shot: The powerful insights dashboard is prominently displayed with the headline 'Unlock True Ad Performance & Insights' clearly visible. A vibrant call-to-action button 'Get Insights' is highlighted. Brand logo subtly appears.

video_brief.voiceover: Struggling with surface-level ad data? It's time to unlock true performance. Gain deep creative insights, and instantly iterate for maximum ROI. Stop guessing. Start winning with data.
